author: Abdul Q
title: Fitbit offers 90-day subscription, premium content for free during lockdown
description: Fitbit Premium, along with 40 pieces of new content, will be available for free to new users for a period of 90 days.
content:
Fitbit is now making its premium content free for all new users for a limited period to help individuals continue working towards their fitness goals while contained indoors.
Indias lockdown was just extended today to May 3rd which means there are more than … [+1131 chars]
